name: Matrix
typ: Nat -> Nat -> Type -> Type

name: MkMatrix
typ: Vect rows (Vect cols a) -> Matrix rows cols a

name: fromVects
typ: Vect rows (Vect cols a) -> Matrix rows cols a

name: toVects
typ: Matrix rows cols a -> Vect rows (Vect cols a)

name: fill
typ: (rows : Nat) -> (cols : Nat) -> t -> Matrix rows cols t

name: zeros
typ: (rows : Nat) -> (cols : Nat) -> Matrix rows cols Int

name: ones
typ: (rows : Nat) -> (cols : Nat) -> Matrix rows cols Int

name: updateAt
typ: Fin rows -> Fin cols -> (a -> a) -> Matrix rows cols a -> Matrix rows cols a

name: replaceAt
typ: Fin rows -> Fin cols -> ele -> Matrix rows cols ele -> Matrix rows cols ele

name: findIndex
typ: (ele -> Bool) -> Matrix rows cols ele -> Maybe (Fin rows, Fin cols)

name: mapWithIndex
typ: {auto rows : Nat} -> {auto cols : Nat} -> (ele -> (Fin rows, Fin cols) -> b) -> Matrix rows cols ele -> Matrix rows cols b

name: findIndices
typ: {auto rows : Nat} -> {auto cols : Nat} -> (ele -> Bool) -> Matrix rows cols ele -> List (Fin rows, Fin cols)

name: eye
typ: (rows : Nat) -> (cols : Nat) -> Matrix rows cols Int

name: identity
typ: (rows : Nat) -> Matrix rows rows Int

name: repmat
typ: Num ele => Vect n ele -> (rows : Nat) -> (cols : Nat) -> Matrix rows (cols * n) ele
Num n => Matrix rows cols n -> Matrix rows cols n -> Matrix rows cols n

name: negate
typ: Neg ty => ty -> ty
Neg n => Matrix rows cols n -> Matrix rows cols n -> Matrix rows cols n

name: scalarMulti
typ: Num a => a -> Matrix rows cols a -> Matrix rows cols a

name: transpose
typ: Matrix rows cols n -> Matrix cols rows n
Num a => Matrix m l a -> Matrix l n a -> Matrix m n a

name: minor
typ: Fin (S n) -> Fin (S n) -> Matrix (S n) (S n) a -> Matrix n n a

name: algeCofactor
typ: Neg a => Fin (S n) -> Fin (S n) -> Matrix (S n) (S n) a -> Matrix n n a

name: trace
typ: Num a => Matrix n n a -> a

name: flipVer
typ: Matrix m n a -> Matrix m n a

name: flipHor
typ: Matrix m n a -> Matrix m n a
